author: ehillenius
msg: when the mode is development, the resourcePollFrequency should allways be set. If the resourceFinder == null, that's fine, because in that case the classpath will be polled, which is the best (most failsafe) setting for development anyway! Whenever templates are changed and saved, they will be copied to the classpath immediately (at least with incremental builds like Eclipse does).
